page.title: 04FISHING WORK
page.content: The local fishing industry based at Port Seton harbour causes employment in Fish Sales or Fish Processing of some sort.Enquiries at 10 such businesses gave these total figures. {NUMBERS EMPLOYED} MEN WOMEN Fulltime/Part-time Fulltime/Part-time 28 9 6 22 Of these 10 businesses 3 are part-time totally while the largest employs 12 men full-time. Of the men who actually go to sea in boats some are daily {PRAWNERS}working out of Port Seton and others are { {TRAWLERMEN}working out of other ports in East Scotland or in the North of England.
